Description:
Responsibilities:Oversee the day-to-day operations of the company's fleet of vehicles.
Ensure that all drivers are following proper safety procedures.
Adhere to schedules and deliver goods or passengers in a timely fashion.
Hire new employees and train current staff on best practices.
Ensure that everyone is working together as a cohesive team.
Monitor vehicle maintenance and repair needs.
Review invoices and claims for accuracy and submit for payment in a timely manner.
Prepare reports on transportation activity, costs, performance, and compliance with regulations.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent.
5+ years of experience in transportation or a related field.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong organizational and problem-solving skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Valid driver's license and clean driving record.

Data.Company Industry: Security & Fire Systems; Private Security Services; Motor Vehicle Passenger Transport
